title: 'Defective piece of same item sent for the second time'
body: We ordered Solimo's sofa cum bed and received a defective piece where the storage hardboard was not of proper size hence we got it replaced. However, the second piece that came is also defective. The storage compartment has come without wheels on one side. Overall not a good product to purchase as I don't think the vendor is doing proper checks before sending it to the customer. I request Amazon to ensure that the vendor does a pre installation check before sending the item to the customer. This was also notified to the customer care executive, the first time I purchased this item.
